title: Biodegradable Cotton Swabs 200 pk
description:
Ditch the plastic and go back to nature. For over a century, swabs were made with wood and cotton—simple, effective, and biodegradable. Today, most swabs are made of plastic that ends up in landfills or waterways. These bamboo cotton swabs bring sustainability back to your daily routine without sacrificing comfort or convenience.

Why You’ll Love Them

  • Earth-friendly materials — Each stick is made from sustainably sourced bamboo with soft, pure cotton tips. Both are 100% biodegradable and suitable for home composting.
  • Gentle and effective — Designed for precision cleaning: remove makeup, clean around ears and eyes, or handle small touch-ups.
  • Plastic-free packaging — Packed in a sturdy, recyclable kraft paper container to eliminate plastic waste.
  • Reusable container — Once empty, the durable cardboard tube is perfect for storing small personal items or travel essentials.
  • Sustainable alternative — Each box replaces hundreds of single-use plastic swabs, making a real impact with every purchase.

Features

  • Contains 200 ridged bamboo cotton swabs with just the right amount of cotton on each end. Strong and soft!
  • Compact, reusable kraft cylinder keeps swabs clean and organized.
  • 100% plastic-free — from the swabs to the packaging.
  • Fully biodegradable materials that naturally return to the earth.

Dimensions

  • Container: 3" round × 3.25" tall
  • Swabs: 3" long × 1/4" at tip

Packaging

Eco-friendly cardboard/kraft cylinder container — reusable, recyclable, and completely biodegradable.

End of Life

When finished, compost the swabs or dispose of them responsibly — they’ll break down naturally without harming the planet. The container can be reused or recycled with your paper products.
